articles.author: Norah  O'Donnell, Sara  Moniuszko, Julie  Morse, Callie  Teitelbaum
articles.title: FDA chief says warning labels deterred women from using menopause hormone therapy: "It's an American tragedy" - CBS News
articles.description: In an interview with CBS News, FDA Commissioner Dr. Marty Makary explains what went into the decision to drop the most serious warnings on hormone therapy for menopause.
articles.content: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration will remove the "black box" warning labels on many hormone therapy drugs used for menopause and perimenopause symptoms — a major turnaround that's likely to enco… [+5855 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: 'Predator: Badlands' tops box office with $80 million worldwide - NBC News
articles.description: “Predator: Badlands” led all films in North American theaters with a debut of $40 million, according to studio estimates Sunday, a better-than-expected result.
articles.content: NEW YORK Predator: Badlands led all films in North American theaters with a debut of $40 million, according to studio estimates Sunday, a better-than-expected result that slightly lifted the box offi… [+4103 chars]
